name: Doodle Boom
description:
Doodle Boom is a fun color matching game! Click on blocks of 2 or more of the same color to collapse them, as quickly as you can, before they overflow the board.

The more blocks you remove at one click, the higher the score you get.

Play more rounds to increase your XP points and level up, which also increases the score multiplier. Increase your multiplier to get the biggest high score.
